charges.charge_disposition: DISMISED on the motion of the United States of America

The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 180 months for counts 1,21,and 23, to run concurrently. The Court makes at Lompoc or Terminal Island. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant will be on supervised release for a term of Three (3) years with standard and special conditions. The Court orders restitution in the amount of $12,726,352.67. Mandatory assessment in the amount of $300.00. Advised of his right to appeal.
